content.body: Kris Kowal: Looking at https://www.collectionsjs.com/, I’m wondering if you haven’t had any demand for LIFO or FIFO maps or sets. I wouldn’t use them myself in favor of LRU or LFU, but LIFO and FIFO are so simple that I’m wondering if anyone has asked for them.

content.body:
> <@jschoi:matrix.org> Kris Kowal: Looking at https://www.collectionsjs.com/, I’m wondering if you haven’t had any demand for LIFO or FIFO maps or sets. I wouldn’t use them myself in favor of LRU or LFU, but LIFO and FIFO are so simple that I’m wondering if anyone has asked for them.

I made some mistakes in the design of collections that precluded adoption, so I don’t have meaningful signal.

content.body: That said, those mistakes are addressable and I’ve got a plan, but not time.

content.body: i have an interest in these things, but not as general purpose collections but as caches
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: i have an interest in these things, but not as general purpose collections but as caches

content.body: we have a lot of pressure, from my observations, of large and "expert" apps asking for GC hooking points and GC info to be exposed for the purpose of writing userland caches
